uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.utils

Class MZTabFileConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.utils.MZTabFileConverter

  • public class MZTabFileConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Convert third-party data source to mzTab file, and do whole MZTabFile consistency check. Currently, only PRIDE XML v2.1 has been integrated into this framework.
    See Also:
    MZTabInspector, User: qingwei Date: 17/09/13
